Property.name: longitude
Property.Description: Initial longitude (as a decimal number).

Property.name: zoom
Property.Description: Initial zoom level (0 shows entire globe).

Property.name: mapType
Property.Description: Initial map display.

Property.name: latitudeProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the latitude value for a placemark.

Property.name: longitudeProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the longitude value for a placemark.

Property.name: onclickplacemark
Property.Description: onclickplacemark event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a placemark is clicked.

Property.name: onrightclickplacemark
Property.Description: onrightclickplacemark event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a placemark is clicked.

Property.name: placemarkTitleProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the title of a placemark (used for tooltip text).

Property.name: placemarkIconProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides icon href for placemarks.

Property.name: placemarkIcon
Property.Description: Default placemark icon href.

Property.name: placemarkSpecialIcon
Property.Description: Special placemark icon href.

Property.name: placemarkSpecialProperty
Property.Description: Special placemark property

Property.name: placemarkIconSize
Property.Description: Placemark icon size (ignored if both placemarkIcon and placemarkIconProperty are not set).

Property.name: coordsProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the coordinates array for a polygon.

Property.name: coordsJsFile
Property.Description: JS file containing "function loadCoordinates(polygonCoordsArray) {}" that populates a polygon coordinates associative array. If <var>coordsJsFile</var> is specified then <var>coordsProperty</var> must contain name of the property that provides keys for the coordinates associative array.

Property.name: colorProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the color of a polygon.

Property.name: onclickpolygon
Property.Description: onclickpolygon event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a polygon is clicked.

Property.name: onrightclickpolygon
Property.Description: onrightclickpolygon event handler: if defined, this event is fired when a polygon is clicked.

Property.name: polygonTitleProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides the title of a polygon (used for tooltip text).

Property.name: placemarkDataProperties
Property.Description: List of properties in data source that provides data to be stored within the current placemark. This data is visible from onclick event handler.

Property.name: polygonDataProperties
Property.Description: List of properties in data source that provides data to be stored within the current polygon. This data is visible from onclick event handler.

Property.name: fillOpacity
Property.Description: Default fillOpacity for polygons.

Property.name: fillOpacityProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides polygon fill opacity.

Property.name: hoverOpacity
Property.Description: Hover opacity for clickable polygons.

Property.name: strokeOpacity
Property.Description: Polygon stroke opacity.

Property.name: strokeWeight
Property.Description: Polygon stroke weight.

Property.name: isClickableProperty
Property.Description: Name of property in data source that provides "сlickable" attribute value for placemarks and polygons.

Property.name: saveBordersMethod
Property.Description: Method name for save slider range borders

Property.name: getBordersMethod
Property.Description: Method name to get slider range borders

Property.name: ondrilldown
Property.Description:
COMMON --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- COMMON
ondrilldown event handler: if defined, this event is fired from drillDown() method.

Property.name: ondrillup
Property.Description: ondrillup event handler: if defined, this event is fired from drillUp() method.

Property.name: onapplyfilters
Property.Description: onapplyfilters event handler

Property.name: drillUpButtonPosition
Property.Description: Where "<< Back" button is located

Property.name: getAdditionInfoForObjectById
Property.Description: Method name to get proxyObject with other info for object

Method.name: %OnGetPortletName
Method.Implementation: quit "KZ Map"

Method.name: %OnGetPortletIcon
Method.Implementation: quit "deepsee/world_48.gif"

Method.name: %OnGetPortletSettings
Method.Implementation:
kill pInfo // $LB(name,value,type,caption,title)
set tTypeList = "ENUM^"_$$$Text("Roadmap","%DeepSee")_":yandex#map,"_ $$$Text("Satellite","%DeepSee")_":yandex#satellite,"_ $$$Text("Hybrid","%DeepSee")_":yandex#hybrid"
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("mapType","",tTypeList,$$$Text("Map Type","%DeepSee"),$$$Text("Initial display type for the map","%DeepSee")) set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("zoom",2,"%Integer",$$$Text("Zoom","%DeepSee"),$$$Text("Initial zoom level for the map","%DeepSee")) set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("latitude",60,"%Number",$$$Text("Starting latitude","%DeepSee"),$$$Text("Initial latitude for the map","%DeepSee")) set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("longitude",85,"%Number",$$$Text("Starting longitude","%DeepSee"),$$$Text("Initial longitude for the map","%DeepSee"))
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("onclickplacemark","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'onclickplacemark' event handler","User callback for onclickplacemark event") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("onrightclickplacemark","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'onrightclickplacemark' event handler","User callback for onrightclickplacemark event")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("latitudeProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Latitude property","Latitude property for placemarks") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("longitudeProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Longitude property","Longitude property for placemarks") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("placemarkTitleProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Placemark title property","Title property for placemarks") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("placemarkDataProperties","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Placemark data properties","List of data properties for placemarks") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("placemarkIconProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Placemark icon property","Placemark icon property") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("placemarkIcon","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Placemark icon","Default placemark icon") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("placemarkSpecialIcon","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Placemark special icon","Placemark icon for special place") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("placemarkSpecialProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Placemark special property","Placemark special property for special icon") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("placemarkIconSize","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Placemark icon size","Default placemark icon size (ingored if Placemark icon is not set)")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("coordsJsFile","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","JS file with coords","JS file with javascript 'function loadCoordinates(polygonCoordsArray) {...}' that populates polygonCoordsArray argument with polygon coordinates keyed by values from the data source property specified in 'Polygon coords property' setting.") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("coordsProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Polygon coords property","Data source property that provides coordinates for polygons if 'JS file with coords' is not specified. Otherwise this setting should contain name of data source property that provides keys for associative array which is populated by javascript code in 'JS file with coords'.")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("onclickpolygon","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'onclickpolygon' event handler","User callback for onclickpolygon event") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("onrightclickpolygon","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'onrightclickpolygon' event handler","User callback for onrightclickpolygon event")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("colorProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Polygon сolor property","Color property for polygons") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("polygonTitleProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Polygon title property","Title property for polygons") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("polygonDataProperties","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Polygon data properties","List of data properties for polygons") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("fillOpacityProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Fill opacity property","Fill opacity property for polygons") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("isClickableProperty","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","IsClickable flag property","IsClickable flag property for polygons")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("fillOpacity","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Fill opacity","Default fill opacity for polygons") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("hoverOpacity","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Hover opacity","Hover opacity for clickable polygons") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("strokeOpacity","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Stroke opacity","Stroke opacity for polygons") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("strokeWeight","","%ZEN.Datatype.string","Stroke weight","Stroke weight for polygons")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("drillUpButtonPosition","top","ENUM^top,bottom","Drill-up button position","Where ""<< Back"" button is located")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("ondrilldown","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'ondrilldown' event handler","User callback for ondrilldown event") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("ondrillup","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'ondrillup' event handler","User callback for ondrillup event")
set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("onapplyfilters","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'onapplyfilters' event handler","User callback for onapplyfilters event") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("onaddpolygon","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'onaddpolygon' event handler","User callback for onaddpolygon event") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("onaddplacemark","","%ZEN.Datatype.eventHandler","'onaddplacemark' event handler","User callback for onaddplacemark event")
//[+] set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("saveBordersMethod","ClassName;MethodName","%String","Save borders method","Method for save range borders, pattern - 'ClassName;MethodName', method takes a single parameter(object) - {parameterId: X, level: X, parentRegionId:X, minValue: X, maxValue: X}. parentRegionId - may be null if this first level") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("getBordersMethod","ClassName;MethodName","%String","Get borders method","Method to get an range borders, pattern - 'ClassName;MethodName', method takes a single parameter(object) - {parameterId: X, level: X, parentRegionId:X}. parentRegionId - may be null if this first level") set pInfo($I(pInfo)) = $LB("getAdditionInfoForObjectById","ClassName;MethodName","%String","Get addition info for object","Method to get an proxyObject with other information, pattern - 'ClassName;MethodName', method takes a single parameter(string) - object id. Call this method like this - 'var otherInfo = zenThis.GetAdditionInformationForObjectById(id);'")
quit $$$OK

Method.name: renderContents
initMap
getMapObject
Method.Description: Return the google map API object used by the map view.
Method.Implementation: return this._mapObject;

Method.name: getDrillUpActionComponent
Method.Implementation: return document.getElementById(this.id + '_drillUpActionComponent');

Method.name: notifyViewHandler
Method.Description: Notification that the dataController associated with this dataView has raised an event.

Method.name: addPlacemark
Method.Description:
Add a placemark to the map at given coordinates.
id is a user-defined identifier associated with the placemark.
Returns the placemark object.

Method.name: addPolygon
Method.Description:
Add a polygon to the map at given coordinates.
id is a user-defined identifier associated with the polygon.
Returns the polygon object.

Method.name: getPlacemark
Method.Implementation: return this._placemarks ? this._placemarks[index] : null;

Method.name: getPolygon
Method.Implementation: return this._polygons ? this._polygons[index] : null;

Method.name: placemarkClickHandler
placemarkRightClickHandler
polygonClickHandler
polygonRightClickHandler
acquireData
Method.Description: Internal method: acquire data for this view and store a copy in a local cache.

Method.name: syncPlacemarks
Method.Description: Internal method: sync placemarks to data from controller.

Method.name: syncPolygons
Method.Description: Internal method: sync polygons to data from controller.

Method.name: getColor
getControl
Method.Description: Obtain a reference to a filter (or any other widget control).

Method.name: openBallonAtPosition
Method.Description: Show an info window at the specified position.

Method.name: clearPlacemarks
Method.Description: Internal method: clear placemarks from map.

Method.name: clearPolygons
Method.Description: Internal method: clear polygons from map.

Method.name: getFilterStateArray
Method.Description: Get the array of filter state information for the widget.

Method.name: panToAddress
Method.Description: Invoke the google geocoder api to lookup an address string and move the map to view it. Applications that call this are responsible for adhering to the google geocoder api terms of use.

Method.name: geocodeAddressHandler
%DrawHTML
onApplyFilters
Method.Implementation: zenInvokeCallbackMethod(this.onapplyfilters,this,'onapplyfilters','refresh',refresh);

Method.name: drillDown
setDrillDownTitle
centerChangedHandler
Method.Implementation: //console.log('test 32'); //if (this._drillDownTitle.length > 0) this._drillDownTitle[this._drillDownTitle.length - 1].draw();

Method.name: drillUp
Method.Description: Restores map parameters (center, zoom and "drilldown title") to their state before drilldown was performed
